publ: by 深圳市浦硕科技有限公司
name: Proscenic
0:
”Alexa, turn on M8 PRO”
”Alexa, turn off M8 PRO”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your “Proscenic”. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
(1). Download the “Proscenic” app from app markets then sign up for an account;
(2). Link your devices on the“Proscenic” app and update with your personalised names for the devices;
(3). Download the Amazon "Alexa" app from Android, Ios or Amazon app markets then link the Echo to the "Alexa" app;
(4). Search the “Proscenic” skill from the skills' category on the "Alexa" app;
(5). Enable the “Proscenic” skill, and you'll be navigated to the login page on “Proscenic” ;
(6). Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
(7). Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on M8 PRO”
“Alexa, turn off M8 PRO”
“Alexa, set M8 PRO to spot”
“Alexa, set M8 PRO to dock”
“Alexa, set M8 PRO to smart”
"Alexa, set M8 PRO to mop"
"Alexa, set T31 to airfry"
"Alexa, set T31 to bacon"
"Alexa, set T31 to toast"
"Alexa, what is the temperature of T31"
"Alexa, set A9 to sleep"
"Alexa, set A9 to auto"
"Alexa, turn on child lock on the A9"
"Alexa, turn off child lock on A9"
"Alexa, turn on light on the A9"
"Alexa, turn off light on the A9"
"Alexa, is light on for A9?"
